activities: Release lanterns into the night sky
Enjoy local food and crafts at the festival
location_info.location_summary: The Yi Peng Lantern Festival in Chiang Mai is a breathtaking spectacle that attracts people from around the world. Participants release lanterns into the sky, symbolizing new beginnings and the letting go of misfortunes.

activities: Enjoy street food and traditional music
related_places.location_summary: Loy Krathong is celebrated across Thailand, especially in Bangkok, where people release krathongs (decorative floats) on waterways, creating beautiful nighttime displays.
Diwali is the festival of lights marked by festivities in Varanasi, where streets are illuminated with lamps, and people engage in various celebrations symbolizing the victory of light over darkness.

activities: Taste French cuisine and local specialties
related_places.location_summary: Lyon hosts the Festival of Lights annually, where the entire city is adorned with light art installations, celebrating the unique luminescence of the city.
